translations: 【名】 （Storey）（西、瑞典）斯托雷，（英）斯托里 （人名）

sentences.sentence: The suspect took a leap out of a third-storey window.
sentences.translation: 那个犯罪嫌疑人从三楼的窗口跳了出去。

sentences.sentence: John was on the uppermost floor of the three-storey gatehouse.
sentences.translation: 约翰在这栋三层门房的最高层。

sentences.sentence: Some people proposed building multi-storey underground grave yards.
sentences.translation: 有人提议修建多层地下墓地。
